name: DealSauce
overview:
DealSauce lets you organize and share all the great deals you find on the web. People use boards to organize their wishlists, plan their gift shopping, or just shop for great deals.

The DealSauce responsive grid user experience is unique within the online deal aggregation space. The block-by-block visual UI is something that Pinterest adopted and popularized within the social content sharing space. DealSauce is doing so within the deal aggregation/discovery space.

DealSauce is a site exclusively for deal discovery and comparison shopping. Additionally DealSauce has its own proprietary technology for comparison shopping. Comparison pricing from multiple vendors is displayed on any product submitted when available.

DealSauce allows users to follow not only other users, but also retailers in order to curate their own deal discovery experience. For example:

http://www.dealsauce.com/target http://www.dealsauce.com/amazon http://www.dealsauce.com/nordstrom

Retailers can provide DealSauce with a feed of deals to automate publishing to the DealSauce site.
